references.paper_title: Learn then test: Calibrating predictive algorithms to achieve risk control
references.reason: This paper provides the foundational theory for conformal risk control, which underpins the methodology of the current work.

references.paper_title: The limits of distribution-free conditional predictive inference
references.reason: This paper establishes fundamental theoretical limits on distribution-free conditional prediction, which motivates the methods of the current work.
This paper introduces a novel target for obtaining coverage conditional on covariate information, which directly inspires the current work's conditional conformal methods.

references.paper_title: Language models with conformal factuality guarantees
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for filtering out invalid components of LLM responses, which the current work builds upon and improves.
This paper introduces an algorithm for optimizing through a conformal procedure, which is extended and used in the current work.
